name: Grillmeister
description:
If you are playing the web version, please use fullscreen mode.

TUTORIAL Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dO6hWgks5JY

Grillmeister, made in 48 hours - a LD38 Compo Entry.

You are the grillmeister. Your grill is your world, and only the orders count!

How to Play:

The game starts with a short tutorial video. Here is a written version:

Left-Click and drag the ingredients from the left on the grill.

Hold-Left Click and press the Right mouse button to flip the meat.

On the top of the screen, orders will appear. If you completed an order, left click and drag the order onto the right service-plate. then drag the grilled meat onto the plate.

Repeat this until all customers are satisfied :-)

You will lose a life if you serve the wrong meat, serve a meat that is raw on both sides or overcooked on both sides (one side of the meat needs to be in the green area), or if you fail to complete the order.

Open the Menu with the ESCAPE key.

You can leave or restart the game there, and toggle the music if you like.

Tools used:

  • Unity 5.6
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Adobe Premiere
  • Blender
  • Audacity
  • Garageband
  • Monster Energy Absolute Zero ;-)

If you find a bug, please drop me a dm via twitter (@dizelabs) or on the itch.io page.
